channel.title: Unable to start Whonix gateway and workstation!
channel.description:
When the whonix operating system is started, it shows the black screen and nothing happens. In the recovery mode the last message it shows is: mptbase ioc0 initiating bringup
Nothing happens after that. Tried to increase ram, nothing helped. Please help.

item.title: Unable to start Whonix gateway and workstation!
item.dc:creator: whonixuser3
item.description:
Try to update the VirtualBox version, on some old versions this can happen

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to start Whonix gateway and workstation!
